preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scroll on the body when the menu is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: 菜单打开时是否防止在正文上滚动。

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the menu when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 是否在按下转义键时关闭菜单。

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether to close the menu when a click occurs outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: 是否在菜单外部发生单击时关闭菜单。

loop.description: Whether or not to loop through the menu items when navigating with the keyboard.
loop.description_zh: 使用键盘导航时是否循环浏览菜单项。

open.description: The open state of the  menu.

portal.description: Where to render the menu when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: 菜单打开时呈现菜单的位置。默认为正文。可以通过传递 null 来禁用

closeFocus.description: Override the focus when the menu is closed.

typeahead.description: Whether or not to enable typeahead functionality. When enabled, the user can type to navigate to menu items.
typeahead.description_zh: 是否启用预输入功能。启用后，用户可以键入以导航到菜单项。

disableFocusFirstItem.description: Whether or not to disable focus on the first item when the menu is opened.
disableFocusFirstItem.description_zh: 是否禁用在打开菜单时对第一项的聚焦。

closeOnItemClick.description: Whether or not to close the menu when an item is clicked.
closeOnItemClick.description_zh: 是否在单击项目时关闭菜单。

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: A callback that is fired when the menu's open state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the menu's open state changes.

events.name: onOutsideClick
events.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: 组件中元素的 ID，当您不一定希望提供自定义 ID，但仍希望访问正在分配的 ID（如果有）时，非常有用。
